comments:
I have a case where a project had a particular facet version (say 1.0) set.  This facet version has been removed from the product (the extension point definition for that facet version is gone) and replaced with version 1.1.  When I open up the project properties and go to Project Facets, it shows My Facet 1.0.  I click the Modify Project button to change the version to 1.1, but the dialog doesn't open and a NPE is thrown as below.  I think there could just be a NPE check added.



java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.ProjectFacetVersion.compareTo(ProjectFacetVersion.java:485)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.util.VersionExpr$Range.evaluate(VersionExpr.java:577)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.util.VersionExpr.check(VersionExpr.java:390)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.ProjectFacet.getActionDefinitions(ProjectFacet.java:199)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.ProjectFacetVersion.getActionDefinitions(ProjectFacetVersion.java:139)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.ProjectFacetVersion.getActionDefinitions(ProjectFacetVersion.java:146)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.ProjectFacetVersion.getActionDefinitionInternal(ProjectFacetVersion.java:193)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.ProjectFacetVersion.supports(ProjectFacetVersion.java:111)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.ui.internal.FacetsSelectionPanel.createAction(FacetsSelectionPanel.java:688)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.ui.internal.FacetsSelectionPanel.updateValidationDisplay(FacetsSelectionPanel.java:1045)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.ui.internal.FacetsSelectionPanel.<init>(FacetsSelectionPanel.java:582)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.ui.internal.FacetsSelectionPage.createControl(FacetsSelectionPage.java:152)
	at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.Wizard.createPageControls(Wizard.java:170)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.ui.ModifyFacetedProjectWizard.createPageControls(ModifyFacetedProjectWizard.java:238)
	at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.createPageControls(WizardDialog.java:669)

This issue has been fixed recently. Could you try the latest from the WTP 2.0.1 line?

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 187451 ***
